intro: Psychotria wullschlaegelii, commonly known as the Wullschlägel psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its slender, woody stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. It produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. This species is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
